Class FlatBooking

java.lang.Object
entity.FlatBooking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class FlatBooking extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a flat booking in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlatBooking

      public FlatBooking(String bookingId, String applicationId, String applicantNric, String projectName, FlatType flatType, String officerNric)
      Creates a new flat booking with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The unique ID of the booking
      applicationId - The ID of the associated application
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - The name of the project
      flatType - The type of flat booked
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer who processed the booking
